author: jukka
msg: OAK-1032: SegmentMK: One SegmentWriter per SegmentNodeStore
Make the currently built segment accessible through readSegment() so we don't need to flush so often.

msg: OAK-1047: TimingDocumentStoreWrapper throws NPE when result is null

author: kpreisser
msg: r1524838 broke the history of the WebSocket Example HTML files. This is because my patch file didn't contain the info that the XHTML files were copied from the HTML files (maybe this is not possible in a patch file).
This commit should restore the history of the files while applying the same changes and renaming them to .xhtml.
